import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import { UserContext } from '../context/UserContext' import { Navigate } from 'react-router-dom' const ReportingPage = () => { const [city, setCity] = useState('Shakopee') const [title, setTitle] = useState('') const [explanation, setExplanation] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [picture, setPicture] = useState('') const { UserInfo, setUserInfo } = useContext(UserContext); const submitReport = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setCity('Shakopee') setTitle('') setExplanation('') setEmail('') setPicture('') } if (UserInfo) { } return (
submitReport(e)}>
